filecoin_growth_impact: By providing free, reliable access to FIL-denominated transaction data and network insights, the API enables builders to create products, visualizations, and analytics that drive transparency and engagement in the Filecoin economy.
description:
Beryx Free API facilitates interaction with historical Filecoin data (FVM and FEVM) and enables users to search for addresses, contracts, transactions (including ERC-20), blocks, heights, and events. The Beryx Filecoin API provides free and open access to comprehensive Filecoin blockchain data including both FVM and FEVM layers. It allows developers to query addresses, contracts, transactions (including ERC-20), blocks, heights, and events with ease.
This year, we significantly expanded the API with new endpoints for miners, datacap, deals, and the Verified Registry. These additions make it easier than ever to build integrations, analytics tools, and dashboards powered by Filecoin data.
Explore the documentation here: Beryx Docs (https://docs.zondax.ch/openapi#get-/account/balance/-address-)
end_user: Developers, data analysts, ecosystem projects, and explorers who need reliable and structured access to Filecoin on-chain data for building dashboards, analytics, and monitoring tools.
testimonials: The API is widely used and praised for its clarity, speed, and free open-access model, with consistent positive feedback from Filecoin developers and partners integrating Beryx data.
how_many_dependents: A growing portion of the Filecoin ecosystem relies on Beryx infrastructure. The Beryx API currently handles thousands of requests every week from developers and ecosystem projects that integrate our data into their own tools and dashboards. Teams such as Blockscout, Filecoin Station, and several independent builders use Beryx,making it an increasingly important layer within the Filecoin developer stack.
